events.message: I purchased a jacket last week, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under refund due to the customer's request to return a product and get their money back.
An agent specializing in returns and refunds has been assigned to assist the customer with their request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with returning your jacket and processing your refund.
Could you please provide the order number and let us know if the jacket tags are still attached?
The order number is 123456789, and yes, the tags are still attached to the jacket in its original packaging.
Great, thank you! You can send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly, and once we receive it, we will process your full refund.
Thanks for the clear instructions! I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label for returns.
We consider your refund process initiated as soon as you ship the jacket back using the label we provided. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label email and to see if you have shipped the jacket back for your refund.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday and am waiting to receive the refund. Thanks for following up!
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund today. You should see the amount back on your payment method shortly.
We have sent a survey to gather your feedback on your refund process experience.
The customer completed the satisfaction survey and rated their refund experience as excellent with no additional comments.
The refund case has been formally closed following successful resolution and positive customer feedback.
